List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.
archivals

Whether to include package archivals.
limit

Number of events to list.
from

Where to start the list, for pagination.
object

Object to summarize.
...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.
x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()

#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package     Version Title                                          
#>  - 3 hours  PRIMME      3.1-2   Eigenvalues and Singular Values and Vectors ...
#>  + 4 hours  rTorch      0.4.0   R Bindings to 'PyTorch'                        
#>  + 5 hours  iCellR      1.5.8   Analyzing High-Throughput Single Cell Sequen...
#>  + 5 hours  MTPS        1.0.1   Multi-Task Prediction using Stacking Algorit...
#>  + 5 hours  fishflux    0.0.1.2 Model Elemental Fluxes in Fishes               
#>  + 13 hours workflows   0.2.1   Modeling Workflows                             
#>  + 14 hours textshaping 0.1.2   Bindings to the 'HarfBuzz' and 'Fribidi' Lib...
#>  + 14 hours callr       3.5.0   Call R from R                                  
#>  + 15 hours RNifti      1.2.3   Fast R and C++ Access to NIfTI Images          
#>  + 16 hours pkgsearch   3.0.3   Search and Query CRAN R Packages               
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)

#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package      Version Title                                          
#>  - 3 hours PRIMME       3.1-2   Eigenvalues and Singular Values and Vectors ...
#>  - 1 day   MissMech     1.0.2   Testing Homoscedasticity, Multivariate Norma...
#>  - 1 day   CryptRndTest 1.2.2   Statistical Tests for Cryptographic Randomne...
#>  - 1 day   irt          0.1.1   Item Response Theory and Computerized Adapti...
#>  - 1 day   genBart      1.0.1   Generate 'BART' File                           
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)

#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package   Version Title                                            
#>  + 4 hours  rTorch    0.4.0   R Bindings to 'PyTorch'                          
#>  + 5 hours  iCellR    1.5.8   Analyzing High-Throughput Single Cell Sequenci...
#>  + 5 hours  MTPS      1.0.1   Multi-Task Prediction using Stacking Algorithm...
#>  + 5 hours  fishflux  0.0.1.2 Model Elemental Fluxes in Fishes                 
#>  + 13 hours workflows 0.2.1   Modeling Workflows                               
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))

#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "PRIMME@3.1-2-"     "rTorch@0.4.0"      "iCellR@1.5.8"     
#>  [4] "MTPS@1.0.1"        "fishflux@0.0.1.2"  "workflows@0.2.1"  
#>  [7] "textshaping@0.1.2" "callr@3.5.0"       "RNifti@1.2.3"     
#> [10] "pkgsearch@3.0.3"
